00056 char rcpt_add(const string &in_fn, const char *rcpt) {
00057     bool enoent = false;
00058     ipfstream in(in_fn.c_str());
00059     if( ! in ) {
00060             if( errno != ENOENT ) return 111; 
00061             enoent = true;
00062     }
00063     string out_fn(in_fn+'.'+uniq());
00064     opfstream out(out_fn.c_str(), ios::trunc);
00065     if( ! out ) return 111;
00066     if( ! enoent ) {
00067             string ln;
00068             string::size_type rcptl = strlen(rcpt);
00069             uint32_t rcpts=0;
00070             while(getline(in, ln) && rcpts < 50 ) {
00071                     if(ln.empty()) continue;
00072                     if(ln.length() == rcptl 
00073                         && ! memcmp(ln.data(), rcpt, rcptl) )
00074                             return 1;
00075 
00076                     ++rcpts;
00077                     out<<ln<<endl;
00078                     if( ! out ) {
00079                             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00080                             return 111;
00081                     }
00082             }
00083             if( in.bad() ) {
00084                     unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00085                     return 111;
00086             }
00087             if( rcpts == 50 ) {
00088                     unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00089                     return 2;
00090             }
00091     }
00092     out<<rcpt<<endl;
00093     out.close();
00094     if( ! out ) {
00095             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00096             return 111;
00097     }
00098     
00099     if( ! enoent ) {
00100             struct stat st;
00101             if( fstat(in.rdbuf()->fd(), &st)
00102                 || chown(out_fn.c_str(), st.st_uid, st.st_gid)
00103                 || chmod(out_fn.c_str(), st.st_mode & 07777) ) {
00104                     unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00105                     return 111;
00106             }
00107     } else if( chmod(out_fn.c_str(), ac_qmail_mode.val_int()) ) 
00108             return 111;
00109 
00110     return rename(out_fn.c_str(), in_fn.c_str()) ? 111 : 0;
00111 }
00112 
00113 int main( int ac , char ** av ) {
00114         try {
00115                 if( ac != 2 ) {
00116                         cerr<<"usage: "<<*av<<" domain"<<endl
00117                             <<"Program adds a line to qmail/control/rcpthosts file."<<endl
00118                             <<"Program returns 0 on success, 1 if entry for given domain exists,"<<endl
00119                             <<"2 if there's more than 50 recipients (in that case it doesn't add),"<<endl
00120                             <<"anything else on error."<<endl;
00121                         return 111;
00122                 }
00123 
00124                 string fn(ac_qmail.val_str()+"/control/rcpthosts");
00125 
00126                 opfstream lck((fn+".lock").c_str());
00127                 if( ! lck ) return 111;
00128         
00129                 if( lock_exnb(lck.rdbuf()->fd()) ) return 111;
00130     
00131                 return rcpt_add(fn, av[1]);
00132         } catch(...) {
00133                 return 111;
00134         }
00135 }
